Instruction: Combine the grated cheese, butter, and mayonnaise in a bowl; stir until well mixed.
In a separate bowl, beat the eggs with the vanilla extract. Add the remaining sugar, baking powder, and milk, mixing until smooth. Pour the egg mixture over the prepared dough in the pan.
Bake in the preheated oven until the edges turn a light brown, for 20 to 30 minutes.
Slice the shortbread into squares while still warm in the pan. Allow to cool completely before taking the squares out of the pan.
